title: New: Pandit – Steady Nerves and a Strong Heart EP
content:
Just 2 days ago Pandit released his new EP, entitled Steady Nerves and a Strong Heart, an EP that was apparently recorded within one night. At times it’s hardly surprising, the whole thing is soaked in a layer of emotional outcry and frustration, amongst an atmosphere that focuses on sweeping vistas and confused yet determined visions.

The whole EP is available for free download here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
